member.name: T:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelWorkBook.

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.SaveAs(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the workbook to an Excel file.

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.Open
member.summary: Opens saved Excel file with OS default program.

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.GetBytesArray
member.summary: Returns the byte array from ExcelWorkBook.

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.AddSheet``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{``0})
member.summary: Adds a sheet to the worksheet, will apply default style config

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.AddSheet``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig)
member.summary: Adds a sheet to the worksheet, will apply provided style config

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.RemoveSheet(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a sheet from the worksheet

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.ClearWorkSheet
member.summary: Removes all sheets from worksheet

member.name: M:ExcelFromList.ExcelWorkBook.SheetExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a specific sheet exists

member.name: T:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ExcelStyleConfig. Use this to add styles, title and subtitles.

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.ShowHeaders
member.summary:
Enable to show headers (taken from the property name), defaults to true
Camel case property names will be split on each capital letter with a space

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.ShowGridLines
member.summary: Enable to show grid lines, defaults to true

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.AutoFitColumns
member.summary: Enable to match the width of the column to the data length, defaults to true

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.FreezePanes
member.summary: Enable to freeze the first row, defaults to true

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.DateFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets custom Excel format string, defaults to m/d/yyyy

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.DecimalFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets custom Excel format string, defaults to #,##0.00_);[Red]-#,##0.00

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.DoubleFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets custom Excel format string, defaults to #,##0.00_);[Red]-#,##0.00

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.IntFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets custom Excel format string, defaults to #,##0_);[Red]-#,##0

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.Border
member.summary: Enable to draw a border around each data cell, defaults to false

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.BorderAround
member.summary: Enable to draw a border around the data range, defaults to false

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color around each data cell, defaults to Black

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.BorderAroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color around the data range, defaults to Black

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.BorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border style around each data cell, defaults to Thin

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.BorderAroundStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border style around the data range, defaults to Thin

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderFontColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the header font color, defaults to LightGray

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the header background color, defaults to DarkSlateGray

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBorder
member.summary: Enable to draw a border around each header cell, defaults to false

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBorderAround
member.summary: Enable to draw a border around the header range, defaults to false

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color around each header cell, defaults to Black

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBorderAroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color around the header range, defaults to Black

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border style around each header cell, defaults to Thin

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.HeaderBorderAroundStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border style around the header range, defaults to Thin

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.PaddingColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of columns to insert before column A, defaults to 0

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.PaddingRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows to insert before row 1, defaults to 0

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the sheet, defaults to null

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.Subtitles
member.summary: Gets or sets the subtitles of the sheet, defaults to empty string array

member.name: P:ExcelFromList.ExcelStyleConfig.Base64Image
member.summary: Gets or sets a base64 image to be placed on the sheet, defaults to null
